alert.note: Alert for Belknap; Merrimack (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 18 at 12:10PM EST until further notice by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in New Hampshire... Souhegan River At Milford affecting Hillsborough County. Suncook River At North Chichester affecting Belknap and Merrimack Counties. Ammonoosuc River At Bethlehem affecting Grafton County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Suncook River at North Chichester. * WHEN...From this morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, Flooding occurs at multiple campgrounds in the region. Water approaches homes along Bachelder Road and properties along Riverside Drive in Allenstown. Buck Street in Epsom floods. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:15 AM EST Monday the stage was 7.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 11:15 AM EST Monday was 7.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 9.9 feet this evening. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
